meta.title: Saraswati Puja 2026 | College Events
meta.description: Seek the blessings of the goddess of knowledge, music, and art on February 1, 2026.

about.title: About The Puja
about.tagline: An Ode to Knowledge and Art
description: We invite all students and faculty to the auspicious occasion of Saraswati Puja. This day is dedicated to the goddess of wisdom, learning, and the arts, marking a special day for our academic community.

The celebration begins in the morning with the sthapna of the idol, followed by a collective Pushpanjali where everyone can offer flowers. The event concludes with a community lunch (Bhog) for all attendees, fostering a sense of togetherness and shared blessings.

highlights.title: Last Year's Puja
highlights.caption: A glimpse into the serene and devotional atmosphere of last year's celebration.

questions.question: What should I wear?
questions.answer: Traditional attire, especially yellow or white, is customary and encouraged for this auspicious day.
